titles: The case of Dame Francres [sic] Clifton the Relict of Sir Clifford Clifton Baronet deceased, and William Clifton, Katharine and Arabella Clifton, the son and daughters of the said Sir Clifford, humbly presented to the consideration of the right honourable the Lords spiritual and temporal in Parliament assembled.
notes: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
keywords: Decedents family maintenance --  England --  Early works to 1800.
